_aboutUsSubTitle: Help you with your new challenge!
_aboutUsText_1: CCode is a young company, where you can focus on new and different technology fields related to Electronics, so we are proud to share that we are never bored!
_aboutUsText_2: Our operations are focused on the industrialization of new solutions and help customers to launch and maintain their new products into the market. Bonded to this activity, we provide knowledge of Mechanics, Electronics and Software development, where embedded systems are the main focus. We are also strong on industrialization of test cases involving Hardware and Software, with a wide knowledge of electronic production.
_aboutUsText_3: CCode was born in 2016 due to a partnership with a group of companies in Switzerland, where we have been able to launch several products with large success in world wide market, using our industrialization processes, test cases and production knowledge.
_aboutUsText_4: Our target is to grow sustainable and help you with your new challenge!
_firstParallax_1: 'We want to hear your needs and help you with our expertise and partners to achieve your goals together'
_firstParallax_2: 'Satisfying our customers is our number one rule!'
_servicesSubTitle: We are committed to act in several fields, and provide professional services in a large range of areas
_firstCard_1: Long term dedicated Teams for Engineering Services & Consulting
_firstCard_2: We can create a dedicated team to meet your needs and necessities, being 100% available for you
_firstCard_3: They can be managed by you or us but always under CCode responsability
_secondCard_2: We have expertise in EMS (Electronic Manufacturing Services) where we have partners being possible provide optimization mainly in BOM price and also teach you the best practices to follow
_secondCard_3: If you don't have any experience with electronic manufacturing, don't be afraid! We can manage that for you
_thirdCard_4: We can help you with the customization of your electronic, case, stickers and product design to meet your customer needs
sendmessage: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
